title: Our Collective Impact
subtitle: See how our community of savers is transforming children's education worldwide
impactBasedOn: Based on our total donations of {{amount}}, here's the estimated impact we've made together.
transparencyP1: At AidVault, we believe you have the right to know exactly where your donations go. Every franc is tracked from your vault to the children who benefit. We work exclusively with vetted educational partners in 15+ countries who share our commitment to accountability.
transparencyP2: Our quarterly impact reports detail every allocation, and our partner organizations provide on-the-ground verification that supplies and funds reach their intended recipients. This isn't just charityâ€”it's traceable, verifiable impact.
joinSaversCount: Join {{count}} savers who are changing children's lives through the power of collective giving.
